title: My client is stuck at 33% and is scanning a ton of files
body: My client is stuck at 33% and is scanning a ton of files plz help

replies.body: Thanks guys for all the help. I tried waiting it out but it got an error at 99%. I ran a  cleanboot and now my client is ok
If it was me I would just go into my computer - C: - riot games - delete the folders there & run the launcher which will reinstall all the stuff u need

> [{quoted}](name=RagingMammoth,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3cMEVxA3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T17:47:05.400+0000)
>
> If it was me I would just go into my computer - C: - riot games - delete the folders there & run the launcher which will reinstall all the stuff u need

Lol do not do this. League always gets stuck at 33% and loads a majority at the percentage. Just wait it out, the time depends on your computer/connection.

I wouldn't recommend deleting folders as that could cause more issues.  Depending on your computer it can take some time the patcher to scan and then download files.  Unless you are getting any errors, it's best to wait it out and let it finish.  Cancelling this could cause the patcher to start over again.  Hang in there!
